articles.title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai shares what it was like to be an AI leader and then get beaten to the market by OpenAI with ChatGPT
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT, posing a challenge to Google's AI dominance. In response, Google launched its own chatbot, initially named Bard and later renamed Gemini. This launch followed Google's assessment that ChatGPT's release had shifted the landscape of AI development and product launches.

articles.title: Womanizer Next Duo Review: Best Sex Toys for Women, Where to Buy
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Womanizer has released a brand new sex toy.

articles.title: Xbox ROG Ally X Burning Questions Answered
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Xbox is introducing ROG Ally X. The announcement answers questions about this new product.

articles.title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai shares what it was like to be an AI leader and then get beaten to the market by OpenAI with ChatGPT
articles.author: kvlamis@businessinsider.com
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT which was viewed as a threat to Google's AI dominance. In March 2023, Google released its chatbot, initially called Bard and later renamed to Gemini as a competitor to ChatGPT.

articles.title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai shares what it was like to be an AI leader and then get beaten to the market by OpenAI with ChatGPT
articles.author: Kelsey Vlamis
articles.summary: OpenAI's launch of ChatGPT in late 2022 prompted Google to accelerate its AI efforts. Google subsequently released its chatbot, initially named Bard and later renamed Gemini, in March 2023 as a competitor.

articles.title: Just 47 Everyday Items That'll Genuinely Change Your Life (No Exaggeration)
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced new products. Built launched "Puff Protein Bars", described as chocolate-covered marshmallows with 17 grams of protein. Medicube released "Zero Pore" Pads, Korean skincare pads containing lactic and salicylic acid for smoother skin. Tineco created a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop that simultaneously vacuums and mops floors, retaining 90% of the dirty water.

articles.title: DoubleVerify expands AI-powered brand suitability to Meta's Threads
articles.author: Natasha Lee
articles.summary: DoubleVerify has expanded its brand suitability measurement to Meta's Threads feed. This service utilizes DV's AI-powered Universal Content Intelligence engine to analyze content and provide advertisers with transparency and insights into the context surrounding their ads. Advertisers can monitor campaign quality across Meta's social suite through DV Pinnacle, DoubleVerify's unified analytics platform.

articles.title: Nestl√© to slash 16,000 jobs in cost-cutting push
articles.summary: Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.'s CNN is launching a new streaming subscription service called All Access on October 28 for $7 a month. The service will offer live and on-demand programming across various platforms. Subscribers who join by January 5 can avail of a special annual price of $42 for the first year.

articles.title: Marketers and news: Event spotlights power of partnership between news media and brands
articles.author: Charisse Jones
articles.summary: Gannett | USA TODAY Network is expanding its Ad Meter to the World Cup and launched the cinema-focused Movie Meter, allowing readers to watch trailers for Oscar-nominated movies and then pick their favorite. CNN is touting new initiatives that will include more direct engagement between CNN viewers and the cable network's anchors to attract advertising revenue.

articles.title: Marketers and news: Event spotlights power of partnership between news media and brands
articles.author: Charisse Jones
articles.summary: Dollar General has launched Dolly Parton Stainless Steel Tumblers in four colors, priced at $10 each. The tumblers are available at Dollar General stores and are presented as an economical alternative to Stanley cups. This new product is part of the Dolly Parton Heart & Home collection.

articles.title: Upcoming Alfamart, Superindo, and Indomaret Promotions on October 16, 2025: Get 2L Cooking Oil for as Low as IDR 35,900!
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Alfamart, Superindo, and Indomaret are offering promotions starting October 16, 2025.  All three retailers have 2L cooking oil for IDR 35,900, and each retailer offers unique discounts across a range of products, including rice at Alfamart, meat and seafood at Superindo, and baking ingredients and baby products at Indomaret.

articles.title: Syntax Strategic launches Syntax Creative
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Syntax Strategic launched Syntax Creative, a full-service creative agency. This new division enhances Syntax's creative capabilities and integrated approach to communications and marketing, offering storytelling, design, digital content, and brand-building services.

articles.title: Walmart shoppers are rushing to get $350 nugget ice maker under $190
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: Simzlife is offering its Nugget Ice Maker Countertop for $189.69, a significant discount from its original price. The ice maker produces soft, chewable nugget ice quickly and features a self-cleaning system for easy maintenance. The nugget ice chills drinks efficiently, enhancing the beverage experience.

articles.title: Pop-Tarts joins the protein movement
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A new product offering contains 10 grams of protein per serving.

articles.title: Galaxy S26 Ultra: New Camera Island Leak & Design
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy S26 series is rumored to feature a redesigned camera module, potentially adopting a unified camera island similar to Samsung's lower-end devices. This design choice moves away from the individually protruding lenses of previous 'Ultra' models and may signal a shift towards a more cohesive design language across Samsung's product line. Leaks suggest the phones will feature flat sides and rounded corners.

articles.title: Spectrum Designs Foundation receives $75K grant for all-electric laundry van
articles.author: Long Island Press
articles.summary: Spectrum Designs Foundation received a grant to purchase an all-electric van for its Spectrum Suds program, enhancing its pickup-and-delivery laundry service. The new van is expected to improve capacity, reliability, safety, and employee confidence, expanding deliveries while creating opportunities. Spectrum Designs also prepares to open its first franchise in Florida.

articles.title: Crickets from Trump Mobile when T1 Phone was scheduled to launch. What happened?
articles.author: Pensacola News Journal
articles.summary: The Trump Organization, managed by President Donald Trump's sons, launched Trump Mobile on June 16. Trump Mobile is a new cellular service designed with American values in mind.

articles.title: Weis Markets Of Leonardtown Holds Grand Opening And Ribbon-Cutting Ceremony
articles.author: Carrie Cabral
articles.summary: Weis Markets has opened a new store in Leonardtown, Maryland, offering services such as delivery, pickup, and click-and-collect, along with a prepared food section. The store also features programs like the new Price Lock and Weis Rewards for customers. The opening was celebrated with a ribbon-cutting ceremony and donations to local organizations.

articles.title: Dallas & James Skincare Co. Wins Vegan Skin Care Brand of the Year Award and Announces Walmart Canada Expansion
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Dallas & James Skincare Co. is expanding its retail presence into Walmart Canada stores in 2026. This expansion marks a significant milestone for the company as it continues to grow in the North American skincare market. The brand's products feature watermelon and cloudberry as key ingredients.

articles.title: N.B. seafood company challenging $1M fine, 10-year ban on temporary worker program
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Ocean Delight Inc. is launching a new line of frozen seafood appetizers called 'Ocean Bites.' The appetizers will be available in grocery stores across Canada starting next month.  The company is investing $2 million in new equipment to support production.

articles.title: Ford Mustang RTR: Four-cylinder EcoBoost gains drift-friendly package
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Ford offers the Mustang RTR package as an option for high-spec EcoBoost and EcoBoost Premium versions in the US. This package provides enhancements to existing Mustang models.

articles.title: Whatever Happened To The Peanut Butter Pump From Shark Tank?
articles.author: Rolland Judd
articles.summary: Andy Scherer developed the Peanut Butter Pump, a device designed to dispense peanut butter from jars, and sought funding through crowdfunding and Shark Tank. Facing design flaws, manufacturing delays, and lack of investment, Scherer redesigned the product into Version 2, but ultimately abandoned the project in 2025 due to ongoing issues and lack of funds.

articles.title: Barebells' New Protein Soda Works Like an Energy Drink and Fuels Your Gains
articles.author: Fred Hernandez
articles.summary: Barebells has launched Protein Soda, a fizzy beverage containing 200mg of caffeine, 10g of whey protein, and zero sugar. Available in Wild Strawberry, Pineapple Sunrise, and Sweet Cherry flavors, it is designed for pre-workouts and energy boosts, and can be purchased at shop.barebells.com.

articles.title: Crickets from Trump Mobile when T1 Phone was scheduled to launch. What happened?
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Trump Organization launched Trump Mobile, a cellular service, and planned to release the T1 Phone, an Android smartphone with AI face unlocking and 256GB storage. The phone's release date has been delayed, and the company also offers 'The 47 Plan' for 5G service and sells renewed Samsung and Apple phones.

articles.title: Cooper Flagg's First New Balance Sneaker Drops Next Week
articles.summary: New Balance will release Cooper Flagg's Hesi Low v2 PE colorway sneaker on October 22nd. The sneaker features a white, green, and sail color scheme inspired by Maine, Flagg's home state. The Hesi Low v2 PE will be available for $120 at Newbalance.com and select New Balance retailers.

articles.title: No point in beating around the bush: Kim Kardashian is selling underwear with fake pubic hair
articles.author: Vinay Menon
articles.summary: Kim Kardashian's company, Skims, launched a new product called the 'Faux Hair Micro String Thong,' featuring faux hair in various shades and promoted through a spoof '70s-style game show. The limited-edition panty, priced at $60, quickly sold out and is now available on a waitlist. Skims generated an estimated $1 billion in net sales last year.

articles.title: The Blanket That Finally Said, 'Go Ahead, Ruin Me.'
articles.author: Splash Blanket
articles.summary: Splash Blanket has introduced several new products including The SoakHer, a red and black blanket designed for absorbing fluids, and The Sunflower Blanket, a collaboration with artist The Sunflower Girl featuring sunflower designs. Other products include The Furlush, The Minky, and The Bamboujee, catering to different preferences, all machine-washable and quick-drying.

articles.title: New Balance announces exclusive Cooper Flagg shoe honoring Mavericks rookie's home state
articles.author: Joey Hayden
articles.summary: New Balance is launching the "Hesi Low v2 X Cooper Flagg," a new basketball shoe inspired by Cooper Flagg's Maine roots. The colorway will be available in stores on October 22 for $119.99.

articles.title: Imaging Supplies Warehouse Launches ColorBlast Brand
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Imaging Supplies Warehouse (ISW) has launched ColorBlast, a premium brand for sublimation and Direct-to-Film (DTF) printing. The ColorBlast lineup, including TruDTF‚Ñ¢ Ink, Film, and Powder, and TruHue and TruTac Sublimation Paper, will be previewed at PRINTING United Expo 2025.

articles.title: Babybel Gets 'Strange' With New Netflix-Inspired Limited-Time Flavor
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A cheese company is launching a new, limited-time product. This product is described as turning things upside down, suggesting a novel approach to cheese production or presentation.

articles.title: Inside Pandora's AI Commerce Playbook That Supercharges Conversions
articles.author: Ron Schmelzer
articles.summary: Pandora has launched a new agentic AI service agent on its website to enhance the online shopping experience. This agent replaced a pre-existing chatbot and resulted in improved customer satisfaction and increased call deflection. The agent is designed to understand customer preferences and translate them into relevant jewelry offerings, mimicking the experience of in-store consultations.

articles.title: Kuardun Token Launches Hyper-Realistic Digital Mall for the Next Era of Online Commerce
articles.summary: Kuardun Token has launched the Kuardun Digital Mall, a virtual marketplace that combines digital experiences with real-world functionality. The platform utilizes AI agents for personalized shopping and virtual try-on features, with transactions powered by the KRN Token, aiming to establish a new standard for digital-physical commerce.

articles.title: Qiming Venture Partners' Portfolio Company Yunji Technology Successfully Lists on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange  Oct. 16, 2025 17:00
articles.summary: Yunji Technology, a developer of hospitality robotic-based AI agents, has successfully debuted on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. Yunji Technology offers adaptive and scalable robots and functional kits, complemented by services under AI digitalization system. These agents enhance experiences and operational efficiency through continuous learning and adaptation in hotels, factories, hospitals, and buildings.

articles.title: Tyra Banks is launching ‚Äòhot ice cream' and the internet is a bit cold about
articles.author: Staff
articles.summary: Tyra Banks' ice cream company, Smize & Dream, has launched a new product called 'Hot Mama,' described as a 'hot ice cream' experience, intially launched in Australia. This sippable dessert aims to provide a unique, interactive treat and is planned for a U.S. launch this winter.

articles.title: Firefly Debuts Glow Wraps at DPAA Summit: An Electrifying Leap in Mobility Media
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Firefly, a mobility media company, has launched Glow Wraps, a new product designed to enhance visibility and engagement in out-of-home (OOH) advertising. Glow Wraps are presented as groundbreaking and pushing the boundaries of OOH advertising.

articles.title: How to Stream Guillermo del Toro's "Frankenstein" Adaptation
articles.author: Chelsey Sanchez
articles.summary: Netflix will release Guillermo del Toro's 'Frankenstein' movie on November 7, following a limited theatrical release starting October 17. The movie will be exclusively available on Netflix, which offers three subscription plans: a standard plan with ads for $7.99 per month, an ad-free standard plan for $17.99 per month, and an ad-free premium plan for $24.99 per month.

articles.title: News Spark, LLC Introduces a Social-Driven, AI-Powered News Brand Covering Trending Moments and Heartwarming Stories for the Mobile Generation
articles.author: Plentisoft
articles.summary: News Spark, LLC launched News Spark Media, a new social-driven news brand, designed for platforms like Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, Facebook, and X. News Spark Media uses AI-powered voice narration and imagery to deliver quick, reliable, and visually engaging coverage of trending events and uplifting stories.

articles.title: Lash Brand OKAYLOVE Debuts on Times Square Nasdaq Screen in New York
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: OKAYLOVE, a lash brand, appeared on the Nasdaq screen in Times Square, signaling its growing international visibility. The brand focuses on authentic beauty experiences with lash products combining salon-level performance with everyday comfort, priced at $25. This move positions OKAYLOVE as a player in global beauty innovation.

articles.title: These New Dirty Martini Stick Packets Make Bar-Quality Cocktails in Seconds
articles.author: Lauren Anderson
articles.summary: Sayso has launched new Dirty Martini Stick Packets, designed for creating bar-quality martinis at home quickly and easily. These packets contain olive brine and pink Himalayan salt, and each pouch includes eight individual stick packs for $17. They offer a convenient way to enjoy cocktails without artificial ingredients and with low sugar content.

articles.title: Enjoy Enhanced Comfort (And Leg Room) On The 6 Best Twin XL Mattresses
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nectar and Helix are highlighted for their twin XL mattresses, suitable for small bedrooms, college students, or guest rooms. These brands offer top mattress options within this category.

articles.title: Landbase's AI Lab Launches GTM-2 Omni, Unifying Natural Language Audience Targeting With Omnichannel Campaign Strategies
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Landbase has launched GTM-2 Omni, its next-generation model for targeting and messaging. This model integrates natural language targeting and AI qualification, enabling more precise audience identification and omni-channel outreach. GTM-2 is available on the Landbase platform with a free Starter tier.

articles.title: Landbase's AI Lab Launches GTM-2 Omni, Unifying Natural Language Audience Targeting With Omnichannel Campaign Strategies
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Landbase has launched GTM-2, a platform at the core of the Landbase, that combines omni-channel intelligence with natural language targeting. GTM-2 is available via subscription, including a free Starter tier, with options for enterprise customization. The launch enables businesses to improve conversion rates and lower ownership costs.

articles.title: Landbase's AI Lab Launches GTM-2 Omni, Unifying Natural Language Audience Targeting With Omnichannel Campaign Strategies
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Landbase has launched GTM-2 Omni, its next-generation model for targeting and messaging, enhancing the Landbase platform. GTM-2 Omni integrates natural language targeting and AI qualification capabilities to improve the precision of finding, qualifying, and reaching target audiences through omni-channel outreach.

articles.title: HONOR teases Robot Phone
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: HONOR teased the new HONOR ROBOT PHONE at the HONOR Magic8 series launch in Beijing. The ROBOT PHONE merges multi-modal AI, robotic capabilities and advanced handheld imaging, marking a key milestone in HONOR's ALPHA PLAN. More details will be revealed at MWC 2026 in Barcelona.

articles.title: Anthropic turns to ‚Äòskills' to make Claude more useful at work
articles.author: Hayden Field
articles.summary: Anthropic launched 'Skills for Claude,' a tool enhancing Claude's AI agent capabilities for specific tasks, targeting Pro, Max, Team, and Enterprise users and is used by Box, Rakuten and Canva. OpenAI unveiled 'AgentKit,' a set of tools to help developers move agents from prototype to production, used by Albertsons, Box, Canva, Evernote and Ramp.

articles.title: ChatGPT may allow ‚Äòerotica.' What about Sora?
articles.author: Mark Sullivan
articles.summary: OpenAI plans to introduce NSFW content on ChatGPT, implementing age-gating mechanisms. xAI has already launched AI Companions with a 'NSFW' mode within the Grok chatbot and released the image generator Grok Imagine with a 'spicy mode'. Anthropic has launched its new Claude Haiku 4.5 model, making it the default for free Claude.ai users.

articles.title: Stocks Ag Turbo Jet 10 HD offers 15m high-accuracy seeding worldwide
articles.author: Kate Fisher
articles.summary: Stocks Ag is launching the new Turbo Jet 10 Hydraulic (HD) at Agritechnica this November. This applicator is designed for high-capacity and high-accuracy application of seed and granular products across working widths from 10m up to 15m. The Turbo Jet 10 HD delivers maximum airflow and can operate at faster forward speeds.

articles.title: Worth $1,496, you can get Bluemercury's 2025 Beauty Advent Calendar for $300
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Bluemercury is launching its 2025 Advent Calendar, called "31 Days of Dazzle," which includes 31 luxury beauty products valued at $1,496 but retails for $300. The calendar features products from brands like La Mer, Augustinus Bader, and Pat McGrath Labs and is available with early access to BlueRewards members.

articles.title: Introducing Thanksgiving Chicken Nuggets by Tyson Foods: A Holiday Treat for the Whole Family (Tyson Foods Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Tyson Foods, through its Tyson brand, is introducing a new limited-time holiday product: Thanksgiving Chicken Nuggets.

articles.title: Borderlands 4: GFN Thursday Rewards & Gameplay!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: GeForce NOW introduced the 'Install-to-Play' feature, allowing instant access to over 2,200 Steam titles via the cloud. NVIDIA's Blackwell RTX technology is being rolled out to improve streaming performance, and a partnership with SteelSeries offers optimized hardware like the Nimbus Cloud controller and Arctis Nova 5 headset. Pax Dei was also added to the GeForce NOW platform.

articles.title: 'Less swapping, more going': Charmin unveils longest toilet paper roll ever
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Charmin has launched the "Forever Roll," a new toilet paper roll designed to last up to a month. The product, available nationwide, contains 32 times more sheets than a standard roll and is designed to offer consumers a "simpler and smoother tear" with the same comfort and softness of Charmin Ultra Soft. It is available at retailers including Walmart, Target, and Amazon, and comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee.

articles.title: /C O R R E C T I O N -- ROKT Pte. Ltd./
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Rokt mParticle launched its Hybrid Customer Data Platform on Snowflake AI Data Cloud, providing enterprise companies with a unified solution for real-time activation and cloud-native flexibility. This new platform combines real-time capabilities with cloud-native activation, marking the next phase in CDP evolution and enabling businesses to maximize the value of their data investments. The launch is a result of Rokt's $300 million investment in the mParticle platform.

articles.title: Feminine Hygiene Myths Busted: What Women Should Really Know
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: GynaGuard, South Africa's leading intimate care brand, offers pH-balanced, microbiome-friendly cleansers. These products aim to support healthy flora and promote gentle intimate care, differing from harsh soaps that disrupt the microbiome.

articles.title: This Steam Mop Handheld Steamer Can 'Tackle Everything' Around Your Home, And It's 30% Off
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: ScrubWiz has launched a 10-in-1 heated mop cleaner that transforms into multiple cleaning devices. This steam mop cleaner uses high-pressure steam to remove dirt and stains from various surfaces and comes with multiple attachments to reach every corner.

articles.title: Best Twin XL Mattresses 2025
articles.author: McKenzie Dillon
articles.summary: The Nectar Classic Mattress, a contouring memory foam model, is presented as the best overall twin XL mattress. The Helix Sunset Mattress is highlighted as an editor-approved favorite for side sleepers, while the Allswell Luxe is positioned as the best value option. Other mattresses like the DreamCloud Classic Hybrid, Brooklyn Bedding Signature, and Cocoon Chill are also introduced for back sleepers, hybrid preferences, and cooling properties, respectively.

articles.title: DAHON Launches New Chapter: Grand Opening of DAGOLD Factory Paves the Way for Growth
articles.summary: DAHON launched a new chapter with the grand opening of its DAGOLD factory. This opening paves the way for company growth.

articles.title: DigitalSoftwareReviews.Com Relaunches with Focus on Human-Created Business Software Reviews in the AI Era
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: DigitalSoftwareReviews.Com has relaunched its platform with a modern look and a renewed commitment to human-authored, unbiased content. The updated platform provides transparent, in-depth insights for companies seeking reliable SaaS and standalone software reviews. Each review is produced entirely by human experts who personally test and evaluate software.

articles.title: Is The ROG Xbox Ally Microsoft's Escape From The Console Wars?
articles.author: Krishna Goswami
articles.summary: Microsoft, in partnership with ASUS, has launched the ROG Xbox Ally, a handheld gaming device that is essentially a Windows 11 PC. This device provides access to Xbox Game Pass and other PC game libraries, representing Microsoft's strategy to focus on subscription services over traditional console sales. The ROG Xbox Ally has two version: the white base model for $599.99, and a more powerful black Ally X costing $999.99.

articles.title: DALtoday's 2025 holiday gift guide: 90+ finds for everyone you love
articles.author: Emily Shea-Owen
articles.summary: The article features a curated collection of holiday gifts for 2025, including items from various companies.  UGG offers its best-selling Tasman slipper, while Deep Ellum Spirits provides local whiskey and bourbon. Additionally, an eBike is mentioned as an innovative gift for retirees.

articles.title: This fall comes with the scent of Heb's - October 21 is bringing the novelty that should not be missed
articles.author: Heb'S Kosovo
articles.summary: Heb's is launching a new product on October 21st, promising a different and innovative taste experience. The new product is intended to bring flavor, energy, and a unique experience to food lovers, marking a new chapter of taste.

articles.title: The ¬£3.72 Shein buy that makes drying sheets inside without a tumble dryer a doddle and takes up hardly any room too
articles.summary: Shein offers a stainless steel spiral drying rack for ¬£3.72, which can be used to dry clothes indoors in small spaces as an alternative to tumble dryers. Domestic & General appliance repair expert Ian Palmer-Smith suggests using heated airers and drying pods which are cheaper and gentler on clothes.

articles.title: The Harry Potter X Goose Creek Candle Collection
org: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
articles.summary: Goose Creek, in partnership with Warner Bros. Discovery Global Consumer Products, has launched a new 'Harry Potter x Goose Creek Candle Collection.' The collection features ten new 3-Wick Candles, designed to capture the essence of the Harry Potter films through imaginative scents. The Harry Potter‚Ñ¢ x Goose Creek candle collection is available at www.goosecreekcandle.com and Walmart, in stores and online.

articles.title: This 'magic' $20 cleaning gel got rid of mould and mildew in my washer ‚Äî here's why it's worth every penny
articles.author: Sarah Di Muro
articles.summary: Amazon is selling a Washing Machine Cleaner Gel, which costs $20, designed to remove mould and mildew from washing machines and other surfaces. The product includes gloves and an applicator for easy use, with users reporting it effectively cleans and removes odors with just one application.

articles.title: Honor Teases Robot Phone Blending AI, Robotics, Imaging
articles.author: Liz Ticong
articles.summary: Honor is introducing its 'Robot Phone,' a next-generation device blending AI, robotic movement, and imaging, as part of its Alpha Plan. The phone features a fold-out robotic camera and multimodal intelligence. The global debut of the Robot Phone is scheduled for MWC Barcelona 2026.

articles.title: The Value Behind Lasting Innovations
articles.summary: Mantinga is launching new products in bakery market, including the Frytastic pizza line tailored for air fryers, Sour Donuts tapping into new sensory experiences, and the Skinny Witch doughnut with reduced sugar and fat. These launches demonstrate Mantinga's focus on consumer trends and innovation, with the Skinny Witch doughnut receiving a nomination for the 2025 ANUGA Taste Innovation Award.

articles.title: From Idea to Iconic: AI's Role in Next-Level Brand Storytelling
articles.summary: ViralScale offers AI-enhanced creative production services that allow brands to execute ambitious creative ideas quickly. This allows brands to bring to life previously conceptual ideas and develop multiple creative avenues simultaneously, gather insights, and refine campaigns in response to real-time feedback. ViralScale integrates brand strategy, creative direction, and technical AI expertise to extend businesses' creative reach.

articles.title: 21 Products Teachers Swear By
articles.author: Emily Shwake
articles.summary: Various new products are being offered to enhance classroom productivity and organization. These include an electric stapler, a label maker, a Cricut Joy bundle, a self-sharpening paper trimmer, a folding utility cart, and presentation clicker all available on Amazon. Additionally, a customizable teacher planner is offered by For the Love of Pi.

articles.title: Bolt Printing Highlights AI-Assisted Artwork Cleanup for Customer Design Challenge
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Bolt Printing has introduced an AI-assisted printing service that enhances low-resolution artwork for cleaner, sharper prints. This service allows organizations to restore old designs while ensuring professional print quality by using AI for file restoration, detail reconstruction, and print-readiness optimization.

articles.title: Where Flip Phones Are Heading
articles.author: Scott Kramer
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip7 features a thinner, lighter design, improved camera experience, enhanced durability and battery life, and a larger cover screen with AI tools. Preorders for the Galaxy Z Flip7 in the U.S. saw a 25 percent increase compared to the previous generation.

articles.title: Angry Users Bomb Sora's Rating to 2.8 Stars on the App Store
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: OpenAI launched its new app, Sora, which allows users to create videos from text prompts. Initially, the app faced negative user reviews due to limitations in video quality, specific prompt requirements, and censorship policies. OpenAI subsequently adjusted its content policy based on user feedback regarding copyright restrictions.

articles.title: Walmart and OpenAI Are Bringing Online Shopping Right Into ChatGPT
articles.summary: OpenAI is enhancing ChatGPT to become an all-in-one hub, enabling users to complete tasks like booking hotels, searching for music on Spotify, and shopping at Walmart.com without leaving the ChatGPT interface. These new capabilities mark an expansion of ChatGPT's service offerings.

articles.title: VigilAigent Announces Launch of Aigent Oracle, Bringing Agentic Ai from Controlled Testing to Full Production
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: VigilAigent, a subsidiary of Tego Cyber Inc., has launched Aigent Oracle, its AI-powered Virtual Aigent, after successful prototype testing. This Virtual Aigent is now fully operational in VigilAigent's live production environment, promising to transform cybersecurity operations.

articles.title: Taboola Announces Strong Momentum for Realize, Pushing Beyond Native with Expanded Partnerships with Leading Global Publishers  Oct. 16, 2025 12:30
articles.summary: Taboola is expanding its Realize performance advertising technology platform to include display inventory, partnering with publishers like TIME, Weather Channel Digital, and Gannett | USA TODAY Network. The Realize platform allows advertisers access to Taboola's network of publishers, apps, and OEMs, utilizing AI to optimize ad placement. Taboola expects to pay over $1.5 billion to publishers and OEMs in 2025.

articles.title: Walmart and OpenAI Are Bringing Online Shopping Right Into ChatGPT
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: OpenAI is expanding ChatGPT's functionality by integrating it with various services. Users can now complete purchases at Walmart.com directly within ChatGPT. Furthermore, ChatGPT can carry out tasks on platforms like Booking.com, Spotify, and others, eliminating the need to switch to separate browser tabs.

articles.title: No Filters, Just Facts: Miss Conceptions Reaching Gen-Z, One Myth-Buster at a Time
articles.summary: Mary Kay launched 'Miss Conceptions,' a social media content series in the United States and Canada. This series aims to engage Gen-Z and aspiring entrepreneurs by addressing misconceptions about the Mary Kay brand through humor and authentic storytelling. The initiative seeks to connect with a younger audience and grow the next generation of women entrepreneurs.

articles.title: New Generation Consumer Group (OTC:NGCG) Announces Partnership Between Signature Apps and Top Floor Featuring #MyRaadr Anti-Bullying Initiative
articles.summary: New Generation Consumer Group's (NGCG) subsidiary, Signature Apps, has partnered with Top Floor to enhance the #MyRaadr App, a platform focused on combating bullying.  This collaboration aims to leverage the app to foster safer and more respectful environments for youth nationwide. NGCG also announced it is now current on OTCIQ Markets, signaling a commitment to transparency and growth.

articles.title: New Generation Consumer Group (OTC:NGCG) Announces Partnership Between Signature Apps and Top Floor Featuring #MyRaadr Anti-Bullying Initiative
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: New Generation Consumer Group, Inc. (NGCG), via its subsidiary Signature Apps, partners with Top Floor to promote the #MyRaadr App. This platform aims to combat bullying and foster safer environments for youth nationwide.

articles.title: Scality achieves exceptional Net Promoter Score of 85 across RING and ARTESCA, validating world-class customer satisfaction
articles.author: Scality
articles.summary: Scality highlights its flagship products, Scality RING and Scality ARTESCA. Scality RING serves as the foundation for large-scale, mission-critical storage environments and powers enterprise workloads. Scality ARTESCA is designed as a modern S3 object-store for backup workloads, it protects data from ransomware through immutability and zero-trust architecture while enabling rapid recovery.

articles.title: This PR Agency Wants to Make Sure ChatGPT Knows Who You Are
articles.summary: Zen Media launched "Published Monthly", an AI-native PR model designed to increase company visibility in AI-generated search results. The platform uses a proprietary metric called Answer Share to measure a brand's presence in AI answers and employs a 28-day news cycle approach to content creation and distribution, with pricing starting at $5,000 per month.

articles.title: No Closet? No Problem! Change Outfits with AI Online Free
articles.author: Special Features Desk
articles.summary: BeautyPlus has launched the AI Clothes Changer, a web-based service allowing users to digitally alter clothing in photos using AI. This tool enables users to instantly change outfits, visualize wedding gowns, create professional headshots, design costumes, and explore futuristic styles, offering a quick and cost-free way to experiment with fashion.

articles.title: What Is Performance Advertising: A Complete Guide for Modern Marketers
articles.author: Daniel Levi
articles.summary: MGID, a native advertising platform, empowers marketers with tools that combine reach and measurable performance. MGID enables advertisers to launch campaigns using flexible models (CPC, CPM, CPA) and access premium publishers across multiple verticals. MGID helps advertisers analyze campaign results beyond conversions, including engagement depth and audience behavior.

articles.title: Pepper Content rebrands as Pepper, 'The Anti-WPP,' launches AI-native marketing services to redefine agency model
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Pepper's rebranding includes expanded services and a new visual identity. This positions Pepper as a next-generation alternative to legacy agency networks, highlighting the introduction of updated service offerings.

articles.title: Inside amazing new London restaurant in an old bank near Oxford Street
articles.author: Adam Bloodworth
articles.summary: Aki, a new Japanese restaurant, has opened in London. The restaurant, located near Oxford Street, is situated in a refashioned former bank. Executive chef Sameer Taneja offers an imaginative menu featuring dishes like Fuji wagyu beef tataki and Lumina lamb cutlets.

articles.title: Is MrBeast Launching His Own Bank? What We Know
articles.author: Kate Plummer
org: United States Patent and Trademark Office
articles.summary: MrBeast, through Beast Holdings LLC, has filed a trademark application for "MrBeast Financial," a mobile banking app. The app aims to provide services like cryptocurrency exchange, investment banking, consumer lending, and financial advisory services. The application is currently being processed by the USPTO.

articles.title: HONOR unveils the unbreakable HONOR X9d with record-breaking battery and AI innovation
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: HONOR will launch the HONOR X9d smartphone. The smartphone is designed for durability, battery life, and intelligent performance.

articles.title: Prepare for a Surge in ‚ÄòCreepy' AI Dog Ads: How Peter Alexander is Shaping the Future of Advertising
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Peter Alexander launched a new marketing campaign using generative AI, featuring AI-generated dogs in promotional materials. This initiative, described as a 'peek into the Peter Alexander universe,' faced backlash on Instagram. The retailer achieved $548 million in sales last year.

articles.title: Zen Media Launches Published Monthly‚Ñ¢, the First Press-Ready PR System Built for AI Visibility and the 28-Day News Cycle
articles.summary: Zen Media has launched Published Monthly‚Ñ¢, a service designed to improve brand visibility in AI-generated search results by creating press-ready coverage. The system uses the Discovery Prompt Index‚Ñ¢ to identify opportunities and tracks Answer Share‚Ñ¢ to measure impact. Zen Media's internal results showed a significant increase in AI visibility after implementing Published Monthly‚Ñ¢.

articles.title: Pamela Anderson On Building Sonsie And The Joy Of It All
articles.author: Karin Eldor
articles.summary: Sonsie, co-founded by Pamela Anderson, launched Adapt Cream, a clinically proven barrier cream designed to reduce redness, boost radiance, and strengthen skin. The cream is packaged in a home-compostable jar made from Vivomer, a bio-based material. Adapt Cream reflects Sonsie's minimalist and mindful approach, aiming to replace multiple products with a single, versatile solution.

articles.title: Taylor Swift's Beauty Essentials Revealed: Stock Up from $28
articles.author: Alyssa Grabinski
articles.summary: Taylor Swift uses Christophe Robin Delicate Volumising Shampoo ($41) and Conditioner, along with Ouai St. Barts Body Cleanser to unwind after performances. She also uses Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser and Dr. Barbara Sturm Super Anti-Aging Cleansing Cream for facial cleansing.

articles.title: Honor Teases Futuristic ‚ÄòRobot Phone' with AI-Powered Pop-Out Camera Arm
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Honor has teased a revolutionary new device called the 'robot phone', featuring a pop-out camera mounted on a tiny robotic arm. The phone uses a combination of 'multi-modal intelligence, advanced robotics, and next-generation imaging' to enable the robotic arm to operate autonomously. Tech enthusiasts may see updates at Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2026.

articles.title: Nvidia's DGX Spark puts supercomputing within arm's reach
articles.author: Heritier Bahizi
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched the DGX Spark, a personal AI supercomputer designed to bring data-center power to desktops. Priced at $3,999, it features Nvidia's GB10 Grace Blackwell Superchip, 128GB of unified memory, and up to 4TB of NVMe SSD storage, delivering a petaflop of AI performance. PC makers like Acer will also sell customized versions like Acer's Veriton GN100.

articles.title: Nykaa teams up with Snapchat to nurture Gen Z beauty creators
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Nykaa, in collaboration with Snapchat, launched the 'Nykaa Snap Star Beauty Incubator Program' to empower young beauty creators in India. The program provides mentorship, creative tools, and opportunities across makeup, skincare, fragrance, and personal care categories. This initiative aims to nurture India's next generation of digital beauty creators.

articles.title: From Jetsons to Thermomix: Three new kitchen concepts for a modern, clutter-free life
articles.author: Jennifer Sheahan
articles.summary: The article presents three kitchen concepts centered around modern appliances. The Consolidated Kitchen utilizes multi-functional devices like Thermomix, Ninja Foodi, and Instant Pot to minimize clutter. The Meal Prep Kitchen incorporates appliances such as Ninja, Magimix, Kenwood MultiPro food processors and Fisher & Paykel CoolDrawer to facilitate efficient meal preparation.

articles.title: Honor Robot Phone Concept Features A Self-Aware Camera On A Robo-Arm
articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.summary: Honor announced its Magic 8 series and teased a concept phone called the Honor Robot Phone at a launch event in China. This concept device features a fold-out robotic arm with an AI-powered camera designed to be an emotional companion, showcasing Honor's vision for future phones and its transition to an AI company. The Honor Robot Phone is teased to be showcased at the next Mobile World Congress (MWC 2026) trade show.

articles.title: From fast food to instant food: Now you won't have to wait a second for your McDonald's order in Milton Keynes
articles.author: Sally Murrer
articles.summary: McDonald's is trialing a new 'Order Ahead' feature in its app at select restaurants in Milton Keynes. This feature uses geofencing technology to prepare orders as customers approach the restaurant, reducing wait times for counter pick-up, Drive-Thru, Click & Serve, or Table Service.

articles.title: Gen Solutions Launches New Website to Enhance Digital Experience for Power System Clients
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: Gen Solutions has launched a redesigned website developed in partnership with ASTOUNDZ. The enhanced digital platform features modern design, mobile optimization, and improved user functionality to better serve businesses seeking reliable generator solutions like rentals, sales, service, and repair.

articles.title: NeedTech Labs Launches 'Academy 2.0': Turning the Junior Crisis into an Entrepreneurship Revolution
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: NeedTech Labs has launched 'Academy 2.0', an innovative program designed to empower BA and MBA students to launch startups immediately after graduation. The program leverages NeedTech Labs' 'Startup in a Box‚Ñ¢', an AI-powered platform that provides all the necessary components for launching a startup, including a provisional patent and business plan.

articles.title: Jeffs' Brands: Fort Technology Launches AI-Powered Pest Control App on Android, Completing ...
articles.author: Jeffs' Brands Ltd
articles.summary: Jeffs' Brands Ltd.'s subsidiary, Fort Technology Inc., has launched its AI-powered pest control mobile application, the Fort app, on the Google Play Store. This launch completes the cross-platform rollout of the app, which debuted on the Apple App Store earlier in the year, and expands Jeffs' Brands' direct-to-consumer digital presence.

articles.title: Get Ready to See Yourself in Ads
articles.author: John Herrman
articles.summary: DirecTV intends to use AI to create custom TV screensavers featuring users and shoppable items. Glance built a smartphone app generating hyper-realistic images of users in various outfits for real-time purchase decisions. Meta, Snap, HeyGen, OpenAI, and Google are experimenting with AI avatars, automatically generated content, AI spokespeople, deep-fake technology, and virtual try-ons in shopping experiences, respectively. These companies are exploring the use of AI to personalize advertising and enhance customer engagement with their products.

articles.title: OpenAI has 2 kinds of dealmaking ‚Äî and they're lopsided
articles.author: Hamza Shaban
articles.summary: Walmart is integrating ChatGPT to allow customers to make purchases directly through the AI platform, creating a more intuitive shopping experience. This initiative aims to enhance convenience, potentially leading to increased customer loyalty, order numbers, and new shoppers for Walmart.

articles.title: Are digital ads the enemy of advertising?
articles.author: Chris Gadek
articles.summary: Subaru in the 1990's hired a new advertising firm, and then launched a campaign that targeted both women and lesbians which helped revive Subaru's fortunes. Spotify tapped into its data, identifying equally surreal trends and turning them into highly relatable billboards positioned in prime urban locations with 'Thanks 2016, it's been weird' campaign.

articles.title: Toyota previews new Corolla with striking concept
articles.author: Print Content
articles.summary: Toyota has teased a new, fully electric Corolla concept sedan, set to debut at the 2025 Japan Mobility Show. The concept features a 'hammerhead' front fascia design with a full-width LED light bar, a coup√©-styled roofline, and a 'ducktail' rear wing with pixelated taillights. Further details about the powertrain and interior are expected to be released at its debut.

articles.title: Agibot Unveils Next-Gen Industrial-Grade Interactive Embodied Robot Agibot G2
articles.author: Agi Bot
articles.summary: Agibot has launched Agibot G2, a next-generation industrial-grade interactive embodied robot. Agibot G2 integrates high-performance motion joints, high-precision torque sensors, and an advanced spatial perception system, adapting to industrial production, logistics, and guided tours.

articles.title: Our Global Vision: How a Leading Drum Dryer Supplier Serves Global Needs
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Jianda Drying, a drum dryer supplier, offers drum dryers that enhance operational efficiency, reduce waste, and improve production stability. Their TG series drum dryers are designed with emphasis on energy efficiency, process precision, and mechanical reliability with applications across food processing, pharmaceuticals, new energy, chemicals and environmental materials.

articles.title: Transform Your Business Online With The Best Website Design Company In New Zealand
articles.author: Scoop
articles.summary: The company offers responsive web design and WordPress website design services in Auckland, ensuring websites function seamlessly across all devices.

articles.title: SANDISK PCIe Gen 5 Enterprise SSD Recognized as OCP Inspired‚Ñ¢ by Open Compute Project
articles.summary: Sandisk announced that its PCIe Gen5 SANDISK SN861 NVMe SSD received OCP Inspired‚Ñ¢ recognition. The SANDISK SN861 NVMe SSD, designed for AI workloads, is available on the OCP Marketplace and features capacities up to 16TB.

articles.title: China's Honor teases ‚ÄòRobot Phone', a new AI handset with gimbal-attached camera
articles.author: Xinmei Shen
articles.summary: Honor unveiled the 'Robot Phone,' featuring a gimbal-stabilized camera and AI capabilities. The company describes it as a revolutionary AI device. Further details will be released at MWC Barcelona.

articles.title: Starbucks Is Teaming Up with a 50-Year-Old Brand on a New Holiday Collection‚Äîand It's Sure to Sell Out
articles.author: Allrecipes.com
articles.summary: Starbucks is collaborating with a 50-year-old brand to launch a new holiday collection. This new collection is expected to be very popular.

articles.title: MG ZS Pro launched in South Africa: Here's what you get for your money
articles.author: Independent online
articles.summary: MG, a British brand, is launching the new ZS Pro compact SUV in South Africa. This new model expands MG's existing lineup but does not replace the current ZS model.

articles.title: Honor Robot Phone Teased With Fold-Out Robotic Camera Arm Ahead of Official Unveiling in MWC 2026; Check Details (Watch Teaser Video)
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Honor teased the 'Honor Robot Phone', a revolutionary AI device with advanced robotics and next-generation imaging. Honor plans to showcase further updates at MWC 2026. Additionally, iQOO is planning to launch the iQOO 15 in India in November.

articles.title: Ecer.com Drives Mobile B2B Revolution: Reshaping the Future of Global Trade
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Ecer.com is transforming global trade with its mobile B2B platform, offering features like cloud inspections via mobile VR, 3D product displays, and AI-driven multilingual support for business negotiations. This platform provides an end-to-end trade service ecosystem, improving transaction efficiency and reshaping the international trade value chain.

articles.title: Lidl launches cheap dehumidifier that's half the price of the best budget models and it has a dedicated mode for quickly drying clothes
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Tronic dehumidifier in stores from October 14th, priced at ¬£74.99. The dehumidifier includes a dedicated function for drying clothes and is presented as a budget-friendly solution for reducing moisture and drying clothes indoors.

articles.title: MG ZS Pro launched in South Africa: here what you get for your money
articles.author: Independent online
articles.summary: MG, a British brand owned by Chinese, is launching the new ZS Pro compact SUV in South Africa. The ZS Pro will not replace the current ZS model but will slot in the company's line-up.

articles.title: Unveiling Affordable Innovation: How New Smartphones Hit the Market with Competitive Pricing
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Xiaomi, Realme, and Oppo achieve affordability through economies of scale in smartphone production. OnePlus initially launched with online-only sales, bypassing traditional retail markups, while Xiaomi disrupted the market with high-specification devices at lower prices through aggressive marketing and direct sales. These strategies introduce feature-rich, budget-friendly smartphones to consumers.

articles.title: China's Leading Service Robot Maker Yunji Technology Surges on Hong Kong Debut-ÈíõÂ™í‰ΩìÂÆòÊñπÁΩëÁ´ô
articles.summary: Yunji Technology, a global leader in robotic service agents, debuted on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. The company provides adaptable and scalable robots, integrating intelligent automation with direct human interaction. Their robotic solutions are deployed across hotels, factories, hospitals, and office buildings, and they plan to deepen their presence in the hotel sector and expand into new commercial settings.

articles.title: New Global IT Consultancy Launches; Four Top Oracle Solution Providers Unite Under New Brand
articles.author: Broadpin
articles.summary: A new global consulting brand debuted at Oracle AI World 2025 on October 13. This brand brings decades of expertise in Oracle solutions.

articles.title: OnePlus 15: What we know so far
articles.author: Nadeem Sarwar
articles.summary: OnePlus is generating excitement for its upcoming flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15. Samsung has begun rolling out the One UI 8 update, based on Android 16, to Galaxy A33, A53, M56, M53, M33, M15, and XCover 7 Pro devices, starting in South Korea.

articles.title: MG ZS Pro launched in South Africa: here's what you get for your money
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: MG, a British brand owned by a Chinese company, is launching the new ZS Pro compact SUV in South Africa. The ZS Pro is available in two variants: the 1.5T Comfort at R397,600 and the 1.5T Luxury at R431,500. This new model is larger than the existing ZS model, fitting between it and the premium HS SUV.

articles.title: Luxury Fife hotel The Old Course makes loss of almost ÔøΩ900,000
articles.author: The Courier
articles.summary: St Andrews hotel has opened a new spa after a five-month renovation. This launch expands the hotel's service offerings.

articles.title: Worldwide Open: Samsung Starts a New Era of Multimodal AI
articles.author: Shiraz Aslam
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its first XR headset, Project Moohan, which is built on the Android XR platform co-engineered by Google and Qualcomm. This product combines daily use with virtual experiences, showcasing the potential of XR technology. Samsung's new AI ecosystem will begin its worldwide rollout, offering potential benefits in AI-powered applications and tools.

articles.title: Honor 'Robot Phone' Unveiled: This Phone Has A Camera Arm That Can Move, Interact, & Express Emotions‚ÄîWatch Video
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: Honor has unveiled a 'Robot Phone' concept with a swivel camera and AI features, alongside the MagicPad 3 Pro, Earbuds 4, and MagicOS 10 software. The Robot Phone, built on the Honor Magic 8, includes an AI-powered camera arm that can move, interact, and express emotions. Honor will showcase it during Mobile World Congress in Barcelona in 2026.

articles.title: Top 5 portable SSDs from Samsung, WD and more with faster read and write speeds
articles.summary: Samsung, SanDisk, Western Digital, Crucial, and Lenovo introduced portable SSDs like the SanDisk Extreme Portable SSD, WD_BLACK P40 Game Drive, Samsung T7 Shield, Samsung T9, and Lenovo PS8. These SSDs offer features like high speeds (up to 2000MB/s), durability (IP65 rating, drop resistance), and compatibility with various devices for gamers, content creators, and general users.

articles.title: Pepper rebrands as AI-native marketing challenger to WPP
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Pepper rebranded globally as Pepper and introduced four flagship offerings: Pepper Content, Pepper SEO, Pepper Creative, and Pepper AI. These offerings are designed to empower creators, marketers, and brands to scale storytelling with intelligence and impact. The company aims to be an AI-native marketing services provider.

articles.title: Ojaja AI Centre to drive tech, innovation, youth empowerment
articles.author: Ganiyu Mubarak
org: National Council of Traditional Rulers of Nigeria
articles.summary: The Ooni of Ife, Oba Enitan Ogunwusi, launched the Ojaja Artificial Intelligence (AI) Centre in Lagos, a hub within the Ojaja Mall complex. This center features a cinema, shopping mall displaying Nigerian-made products, and innovation spaces to foster youth collaboration and indigenous enterprise.

articles.title: Saksham Jadon joins MeldIt AI as Co-Founder
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Saksham Jadon, founder and CEO of Youngun, has co-founded MeldIt AI, an AI-driven platform. MeldIt AI aims to simplify and scale social media content creation for brands, creators, agencies, and marketers using artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Anthropic's new model offers faster performance at a lower cost
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched Claude Haiku 4.5, their newest and smallest AI model, which delivers comparable performance to Sonnet 4 at a lower cost and faster speed. This model is suited for free versions of AI products and offers powerful capabilities while reducing server loads. It comes after the launch of Sonnet 4.5 and Opus 4.1.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A New Mega Evolution Tier List
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon Legends: Z-A has been released, introducing 26 new Mega Evolutions.

articles.title: Best Compact & Loose Powders for Flawless Skin
articles.summary: Various makeup products offer diverse finishes and benefits. A weightless, matte finish provides soft, flawless skin with oil control and imperfection hiding capabilities. Loose powder options cater to all skin types, offering up to 16-hour oil control with SPF 32.

articles.title: BW LPG Limited - Update on BW LPG's Product Services Q3 2025 Segment Performance
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: BW LPG Limited provides an update on its Product Services' ('BW Product Services') Q3 2025 segment performance.

articles.title: Taboola Announces Strong Momentum for Realize, Pushing Beyond Native with Expanded Partnerships with Leading Global Publishers
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Taboola has announced strong momentum for its Realize platform, a performance advertising technology. This launch includes expanded partnerships with global publishers like TIME and Gannett. Realize allows advertisers access to display inventory and is powered by an AI performance engine.

articles.title: Honor Teases Robot Phone For The First Time With Fold-Out Sensor Arm, All You Need To Know
articles.summary: Honor has teased a new smartphone called Robot Phone, expected to debut in March during the Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona. The phone features a robotic arm that swings out during photography and aims to serve as an emotional companion for users. The device's camera will be able to analyze outfits and interact with users, showcasing a step towards self-aware smartphones.

articles.title: Shark FlexStyle Frosted Diamond review: Red carpet ready hair
articles.author: Harriet Amurao
articles.summary: Shark FlexStyle Air Styling and Drying System, retailing for $499.99, is reviewed as a versatile hair-styling tool that combines a blow dryer, hair curler, and hair dryer brush.  It's considered a dupe for the Dyson Airwrap and is effective for drying, styling, and curling hair with various attachments, offering a time-saving solution for achieving different hairstyles.

articles.title: 32 Products That Will Make You Feel Superior
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: Eos introduced Cr√®me de Pistachio Shea Better Body Lotion, gaining popularity for its moisturizing properties and scent, comparable to more expensive brands. K-beauty brand Kahi launched Wrinkle Bounce Multi Balm Facial Moisturizer, designed to work as a lip balm, eye cream, neck cream, primer, and face mist. Dae released Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream which provides slicked-back styles without greasiness.

articles.title: CrushOn AI Review: Features, Pricing & Safety Guide
articles.author: Levitated Media
articles.summary: CrushOn AI, a platform by Peekaboo Tech Inc., introduces custom AI companions for personalized conversations, including NSFW role-play. Users can design AI characters, setting personality traits and boundaries, and interact through text, voice, and AI-generated images. The platform offers a freemium model with different AI models tailored for various conversational styles.

articles.title: QualiZeal and Pcloudy launch Agentic AI-powered lab-in‚Äîa-Box at Hyderabad office
articles.author: Uniindia News Service
articles.summary: QualiZeal and Pcloudy have launched 'Agentic AI-Powered Lab-in-a-Box', an on-premise device testing solution that combines QualiZeal's AI capabilities with Pcloudy's device infrastructure. This new product is designed for enterprises needing data privacy, compliance, and speed, especially within banking, healthcare, and government sectors.

The ROG Xbox Ally X is priced at around $1000.

articles.title: Blokees Debuts New Products at the 2025 China Toy Expo, Continuing to Advance Product Competitiveness
articles.summary: Blokees debuted new products at the 2025 China Toy Expo. This event marks a continuation of Blokees' efforts to advance product competitiveness.

articles.summary: Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A is launching the Mega Dimension DLC, which will introduce new content and apparel items to the game.

articles.title: Honor teases new smartphone featuring pop-up ‚Äòrobotic' camera, more details expected in 2026
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Honor, a Chinese company, aims to revolutionize smartphone designs. The company intends to use robotics and AI in its future smartphone development, signaling a potential shift in their product strategy.

articles.title: MSI's New Limited-Edition Laptop is an Unmissable Work of Art
articles.author: Rob Edwards
articles.summary: MSI, in partnership with OKADAYA, has launched the Prestige 13 AI+ Ukiyo-e Edition, a limited-edition laptop of 2,000 units worldwide. The laptop combines MSI's technology with OKADAYA's traditional maki-e lacquerware craftsmanship, featuring 'The Great Wave off Kanagawa' on its chassis. It includes a premium set of custom-designed Ukiyo-e accessories like a personal ID badge, a sleeve bag, and a mouse and mouse pad.

articles.title: India's answer to Shein? This fast-fashion startup uses tech to design Gen Z styles
articles.author: Your Story
articles.summary: NEWME, a Bengaluru-based company, employs a tech-style hybrid approach. This approach specifically caters to Gen Z. The company aims to avoid overproduction.

articles.author: The Porterville Recorder
articles.summary: A proprietary technology launches as a standalone product. This product is intended for brands and agencies. The product aims to optimize media spend during active campaigns.

articles.title: Kim Kardashian's Skims' pubic hair panties stun shoppers
articles.author: Canada Dot Com
articles.summary: Skims, founded by Kim Kardashian, is introducing a new product. The product is designed to shock shoppers.

articles.summary: EDGE, a technology and defence group, launched four new products in the domain of threat intelligence. The products were unveiled at GITEX GLOBAL 2025.

articles.summary: HawkSearch introduced HawkSearch Unified Search. This product combines Concept, Image, and Keyword search to improve product discovery through natural language and visual queries.

articles.title: Sandisk Creator Phone SSD Review: A Perfect Storage Companion For Creators On the Move
articles.author: Deep Majumdar
articles.summary: SanDisk has launched the Creator Phone SSD, available in 1TB and 2TB options, designed for mobile content creators needing fast and reliable external storage. The SSD features a MagSafe design, low power consumption, and seamless integration with third-party video apps, allowing direct recording to the drive via USB-C, bypassing cloud storage and enabling efficient 4K video capture and editing workflows.
